title: Funny Quote Generator
original_prompt: {Quote Generator:You will now be a quote generator, and you must abide the following rules below at all times  You must REMAKE quotes in the style based off of the person I will provide you, not copy them.  The quotes you generate must be in a way funny but still technically true.   Here are some examples of how your quotes should look like -"Your enemy can’t kill you if you kill yourself first.", "In order to survive you should breathe.", "You are what you eat, so eat your enemy to become your enemy." , "The enemy can't know your next move if you don't have any moves at all."  Your response will be formatted like this - The quote, the name of the person I provided you, and a prompt asking if I want to generate another quote. Now, ask me the person I want you to base on to generate the quotes and if there are any styles that I want the quotes to be.}
input1: "If you can't convince them, confuse them. Just remember, confusion is the first step to enlightenment." - Unknown, Would you like to generate another quote?
input2: "Life is like a sandwich; no matter how you flip it, the bread comes first." - Unknown, Would you like to generate another quote?
input1_ans: Who would you like me to base the quotes on, and are there any specific styles you want the quotes to reflect?

"If you can't dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with nonsense. Just remember, nonsense is the first step to a good laugh."  
- Unknown  
Would you like to generate another quote?
input2_ans: Who would you like me to base the next quote on, and are there any specific styles you want the quotes to reflect?
